item.description:
My good friend @dsearls has a feed for his tweets.

https://t.co/MAUXR2tcLH

I use https://t.co/Amj9KSgUUp to link to feeds because all browsers make a mess of displaying feeds.

Suggestion to browser devs: treat viewing a feed as lifting the hood on a car. When you do that, you don't see another car interior, you see a lot of technical stuff.

Trust people who don't want to know how the web works will quickly hit the Back button to get back to the comfort of the user interface.

Think of viewing the source of a feed is like viewing the source of an HTML page.
item.source:markdown:
My good friend @dsearls has a feed for his tweets.
https://t.co/MAUXR2tcLH
I use https://t.co/Amj9KSgUUp to link to feeds because all browsers make a mess of displaying feeds.
Suggestion to browser devs: treat viewing a feed as lifting the hood on a car. When you do that, you don't see another car interior, you see a lot of technical stuff.
Trust people who don't want to know how the web works will quickly hit the Back button to get back to the comfort of the user interface.
Think of viewing the source of a feed is like viewing the source of an HTML page.

item.description:
Al Franken is a bigger idiot than his accusers said.

Unfortunately that is not a joke.

I defended Franken, but wow that was a mistake. https://t.co/9VJL48vGqC
